channel.title: Git on Ryan Derr's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Ryan Derr's Blog

item.title: A Case For PoshGit
item.description: As developers, our daily workflow often revolves around Git and I’m no different. It’s the go-to version control system for managing code changes, collaborating with teammates, and ensuring project integrity. While I always lean toward using systems that run Bash (shoutout to Unix), that’s not always an option and using Git from the command line can be tedious and time-consuming. Enter PoshGit - a PowerShell module designed to enhance your Git experience and streamline your workflow.
